title: Post-Attack Technique-Specific Questions
description: Detailed questions for gathering evidence and analysis based on selected MITRE ATT&CK technique-tactic combinations

question_flow.question: What sort of system were they targeting?
question_flow.explanation: Select the type of system that was the focus of the reconnaissance activities.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the reconnaissance target is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the reconnaissance target could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other reconnaissance target:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific system or service that was targeted during reconnaissance.

question_flow.question: Which CVEs were exploited for initial access?
question_flow.explanation: Enter the CVE identifiers for vulnerabilities that were exploited in public-facing applications. The system will validate CVE format (CVE-YYYY-NNNNN) and help prevent duplicates. You can enter multiple CVEs separated by commas.

question_flow.question: Which CVEs were exploited for lateral movement?
question_flow.explanation: Enter the CVE identifiers for vulnerabilities that were exploited in remote services for lateral movement. The system will validate CVE format (CVE-YYYY-NNNNN) and help prevent duplicates.

question_flow.question: Which CVEs were exploited for credential access?
question_flow.explanation: Enter the CVE identifiers for vulnerabilities that were exploited to gain access to credentials. The system will validate CVE format (CVE-YYYY-NNNNN) and help prevent duplicates.

question_flow.question: Which CVEs were exploited for privilege escalation?
question_flow.explanation: Enter the CVE identifiers for vulnerabilities that were exploited to escalate privileges. The system will validate CVE format (CVE-YYYY-NNNNN) and help prevent duplicates.

question_flow.question: What sort of data was exfiltrated?
question_flow.explanation: Select the primary type of data that was stolen from the organization.

options.label: Technical System data (including staff account data)

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the exfiltrated data type is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the type of exfiltrated data could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other type of exfiltrated data:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific type of data that was stolen.

question_flow.question: When did exfiltration occur?
question_flow.explanation: Provide the date and time when data exfiltration was observed. Use the datetime picker to specify timing with appropriate precision.

question_flow.question: What was the source of the phish?
question_flow.explanation: Select the type of entity that appeared to send the phishing message.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the phishing source is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the source of the phishing attack could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other phishing source:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific type of entity that appeared to send the phishing message.

question_flow.question: How many victims were phished at the victim organisation?
question_flow.explanation: Select the number of people within the organization who received phishing messages.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the number of phishing victims is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the number of phishing victims could not be determined.

question_flow.question: What was the source of the phishing for information attempt?
question_flow.explanation: Select the type of entity that appeared to send the information gathering phishing message.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the phishing source is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the source of the information gathering attempt could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other phishing source:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific type of entity that appeared to send the information gathering message.

question_flow.question: Which service was used for phishing?
question_flow.explanation: Select the communication service that was used to deliver the phishing message.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the phishing service is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the communication service used for phishing could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other phishing service:
sub_questions.explanation: Name and describe the specific communication service that was used for phishing.

question_flow.question: What file format was the attachment?
question_flow.explanation: Select the format of the malicious file that was attached to the phishing message.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the attachment format is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the file format could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other attachment format:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific file format that was used for the malicious attachment.

question_flow.question: What was the destination of the link?
question_flow.explanation: Select what the malicious link was designed to do when clicked.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the link destination is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the purpose of the malicious link could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other link destination:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe what the malicious link was designed to do.

sub_questions.question: How was the file hosted?
sub_questions.explanation: Select the type of infrastructure used to host the malicious file.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the file hosting method is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the hosting infrastructure could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other file hosting method:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific type of infrastructure used to host the malicious file.

sub_questions.question: Which legitimate service?
sub_questions.explanation: Name the legitimate service that was used to host the malicious file.

sub_questions.question: Which service did the phishing site masquerade as?
sub_questions.explanation: Select what legitimate service the fake credential harvesting site was impersonating.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the masqueraded service is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the impersonated service could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other masqueraded service:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe what specific service the phishing site was impersonating.

question_flow.question: Was the link single use?
question_flow.explanation: Determine if the malicious link could only be used once or multiple times.

sub_questions.question: Why is the type of link unknown?
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why it could not be determined if the link was single-use.

question_flow.question: Was the link unique per user?
question_flow.explanation: Determine if each user received a unique link or if the same link was sent to multiple users.

sub_questions.question: Why is the service unknown?
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why it could not be determined if links were unique per user.

question_flow.question: Was a Cloud Service affected?
question_flow.explanation: Determine if the attack involved compromise of cloud-based services.

sub_questions.question: If so, which Cloud Service was targeted?
sub_questions.explanation: Select the specific cloud service provider that was compromised.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other cloud service:
sub_questions.explanation: Name the specific cloud service provider that was targeted.
sub_questions.placeholder: e.g., Azure, IBM Cloud, Oracle Cloud

sub_questions.question: Did the victim contact the Cloud Service Provider about this issue?
sub_questions.explanation: Determine if the victim organization reached out to their cloud provider regarding the compromise.

question_flow.question: What MFA was in use?
question_flow.explanation: Select the type of multi-factor authentication that was configured for the compromised accounts.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the MFA type is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the multi-factor authentication configuration could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other MFA type:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific multi-factor authentication method that was in use.

question_flow.question: What MFA was in use for the default accounts?
question_flow.explanation: Select the type of multi-factor authentication that was configured for the compromised default accounts.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the MFA type is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the multi-factor authentication configuration could not be determined for the default accounts.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other MFA type:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific multi-factor authentication method that was in use for the default accounts.

question_flow.question: What MFA was in use for the domain accounts?
question_flow.explanation: Select the type of multi-factor authentication that was configured for the compromised domain accounts.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the MFA type is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the multi-factor authentication configuration could not be determined for the domain accounts.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other MFA type:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific multi-factor authentication method that was in use for the domain accounts.

question_flow.question: What MFA was in use for the local accounts?
question_flow.explanation: Select the type of multi-factor authentication that was configured for the compromised local accounts.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the MFA type is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the multi-factor authentication configuration could not be determined for the local accounts.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other MFA type:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific multi-factor authentication method that was in use for the local accounts.

question_flow.question: What MFA was in use for the cloud accounts?
question_flow.explanation: Select the type of multi-factor authentication that was configured for the compromised cloud accounts.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the MFA type is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the multi-factor authentication configuration could not be determined for the cloud accounts.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other MFA type:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific multi-factor authentication method that was in use for the cloud accounts.

question_flow.question: What was the source of the spearphishing attachment?
question_flow.explanation: Select the type of entity that appeared to send the spearphishing message with attachment.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the spearphishing attachment source is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the source of the spearphishing attachment attack could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other spearphishing attachment source:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific type of entity that appeared to send the spearphishing attachment message.

question_flow.question: How many victims received spearphishing attachments at the victim organisation?
question_flow.explanation: Select the number of people within the organization who received spearphishing attachment messages.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the number of spearphishing attachment victims is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the number of spearphishing attachment victims could not be determined.

question_flow.question: What was the source of the spearphishing link?
question_flow.explanation: Select the type of entity that appeared to send the spearphishing message with malicious link.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the spearphishing link source is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the source of the spearphishing link attack could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other spearphishing link source:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific type of entity that appeared to send the spearphishing link message.

question_flow.question: How many victims received spearphishing links at the victim organisation?
question_flow.explanation: Select the number of people within the organization who received spearphishing link messages.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the number of spearphishing link victims is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the number of spearphishing link victims could not be determined.

question_flow.question: What was the source of the spearphishing via service?
question_flow.explanation: Select the type of entity that appeared to send the spearphishing message via third-party service.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the spearphishing service source is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the source of the spearphishing via service attack could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other spearphishing service source:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific type of entity that appeared to send the spearphishing via service message.

question_flow.question: How many victims received spearphishing via service at the victim organisation?
question_flow.explanation: Select the number of people within the organization who received spearphishing messages via third-party service.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the number of spearphishing via service victims is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the number of spearphishing via service victims could not be determined.

question_flow.question: What was the source of the spearphishing voice call?
question_flow.explanation: Select the type of entity that appeared to make the spearphishing voice call.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the spearphishing voice source is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the source of the spearphishing voice attack could not be determined.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other spearphishing voice source:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific type of entity that appeared to make the spearphishing voice call.

question_flow.question: How many victims received spearphishing voice calls at the victim organisation?
question_flow.explanation: Select the number of people within the organization who received spearphishing voice calls.

sub_questions.question: Please explain why the number of spearphishing voice victims is unknown:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide details about why the number of spearphishing voice victims could not be determined.

question_flow.question: Was a Cloud Service affected during lateral movement?
question_flow.explanation: Determine if lateral movement involved compromise of cloud-based services.

sub_questions.question: Which Cloud Service was used for lateral movement?
sub_questions.explanation: Select the specific cloud service provider that was used for lateral movement.

question_flow.question: Do we know when their systems were encrypted?
question_flow.explanation: Determine if the timing of the ransomware encryption is known.

sub_questions.question: If so, when were their systems encrypted?
sub_questions.explanation: Provide the date and time when systems were encrypted by ransomware using the datetime picker.

question_flow.question: Do we know which ransomware family was involved?
question_flow.explanation: Determine if the specific ransomware variant has been identified.

sub_questions.question: If so, which ransomware was deployed?
sub_questions.explanation: Select the specific ransomware family that was identified.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other ransomware family:
sub_questions.explanation: Name the specific ransomware variant that was identified.

question_flow.question: Did they receive a ransom demand?
question_flow.explanation: Determine if the victim organization received a ransom demand from the attackers.

sub_questions.question: If so, How did they receive it?
sub_questions.explanation: Select how the ransom demand was delivered to the victim organization.

options.label: Ransom note file on encrypted systems

sub_questions.question: Please specify how the ransom demand was delivered:
sub_questions.explanation: Describe the specific method used to deliver the ransom demand.
sub_questions.placeholder: e.g., SMS, social media message, printed note

sub_questions.question: When did they receive it?
sub_questions.explanation: Provide the date and time when the ransom demand was received using the datetime picker.

sub_questions.question: Do we know how much was demanded?
sub_questions.explanation: Determine if the specific ransom amount is known.

sub_questions.question: If so, how much was demanded?
sub_questions.explanation: Specify the ransom amount that was demanded, including currency.

question_flow.question: Was their information leaked online before the end of our engagement?
question_flow.explanation: Determine if the victim's data was published online by the attackers during the engagement period.

sub_questions.question: If so, when was their data leaked online?
sub_questions.explanation: Provide the date and time when the victim's data was published online using the datetime picker.

question_flow.question: Any idea where the credentials came from?
question_flow.explanation: Please provide details about the source of the credentials that were gathered during reconnaissance.

question_flow.question: What were they searching for?
question_flow.explanation: Please describe what specific information or resources the attacker was searching for on victim-owned websites.

question_groups.description: Questions for parent techniques in reconnaissance where no sub-techniques were selected

question_flow.question: Why didn't you pick one of the sub-techniques?
question_flow.explanation: Please explain why you selected the parent technique instead of a more specific sub-technique.

question_flow.question: What domains did they obtain?
question_flow.explanation: Please list and describe the domains that were acquired by the attacker.

question_flow.question: What are the details of the DNS Server?
question_flow.explanation: Please provide detailed information about the DNS server that was acquired.

question_flow.question: What provider did they obtain the VPS from?
question_flow.explanation: Select the cloud or hosting provider used to acquire the VPS.

sub_questions.question: Please specify the other VPS provider:
sub_questions.explanation: Provide the name of the VPS provider.

question_flow.question: What are the details of the VPS?
question_flow.explanation: Please provide detailed information about the VPS that was acquired (IP addresses, specifications, etc.).

question_flow.question: Describe the 0-day used
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a detailed description of the 0-day vulnerability or exploit that was used.

question_flow.question: Where was the malware hosted?
question_flow.explanation: Since T1583 or T1584 were not selected, please explain where the malware was hosted and how hosting was obtained.

question_flow.question: Describe the Drive-by Compromise
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a detailed description of how the drive-by compromise was executed.

question_flow.question: How did they gain access to the External Remote Services?
question_flow.explanation: Since valid accounts (T1078.*) were not used, please explain how access to external remote services was obtained.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual technique - you must write it up in full.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how replication through removable media was used for initial access, including methods and technical details.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual technique - you must write it up in full.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how hardware additions were used for initial access, including methods and technical details.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual technique - you must write it up in full.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how content injection was used for initial access, including methods and technical details.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual technique - you must write it up in full.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how container administration command was used for initial access, including methods and technical details.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual technique - you must write it up in full.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how supply chain compromise through compromised hardware supply chain was used for initial access, including methods and technical details.

question_groups.description: Questions for parent techniques in execution where no sub-techniques were selected

question_flow.question: Why didn't you pick one of the sub-techniques?
question_flow.explanation: Please explain why you selected the parent technique instead of a more specific sub-technique.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual Persistence technique, please be sure to describe it in detail.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a detailed description of how system firmware was modified for persistence and how it was implemented.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual Persistence technique, please be sure to describe it in detail.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a detailed description of how component firmware was modified for persistence and how it was implemented.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual Persistence technique, please be sure to describe it in detail.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a detailed description of how the bootkit was used for persistence and how it was implemented.

question_flow.explanation: Please provide a detailed description of how the ROMMONkit was used for persistence and how it was implemented.

question_flow.explanation: Please provide a detailed description of how TFTP boot was used for persistence and how it was implemented.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual Privilege Escalation technique, please be sure to describe it in detail.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a detailed description of how the escape to host technique was used for privilege escalation.

question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how environmental keying was used for defense evasion, including technical details and implementation.

question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how component firmware modification was used for defense evasion, including technical details and implementation.

question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how code signing was used for defense evasion, including technical details and implementation.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual technique - you must write it up in full.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how multi-factor authentication interception was used for credential access, including technical details and methods used.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual technique - you must write it up in full.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how credentials in files were accessed for credential access, including technical details and methods used.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual technique - you must write it up in full.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how communication through removable media was used for command and control, including technical implementation details.

question_flow.question: Use of legitimate services for C2 is very interesting. Please write up in full.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how web services were used for command and control, including technical implementation details and any legitimate services used.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual technique - you must write it up in full.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how exfiltration over Bluetooth was used, including methods and technical details.

question_flow.question: This is an unusual technique - you must write it up in full.
question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how exfiltration over USB was used, including methods and technical details.

question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how system recovery was inhibited for impact, including technical details and effects on the organization.

question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how firmware corruption was used for impact, including technical details and effects on the organization.

question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how stored data manipulation was used for impact, including technical details and effects on the organization.

question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how transmitted data manipulation was used for impact, including technical details and effects on the organization.

question_flow.explanation: Please provide a comprehensive write-up of how runtime data manipulation was used for impact, including technical details and effects on the organization.

question_flow.question: Why didn't you pick one of the sub-techniques for Boot or Logon Initialization Scripts (T1037)?
question_flow.explanation: This technique has more specific sub-techniques available. Please explain why the general technique was selected instead of a more specific sub-technique.

metadata.version_notes: Schema v1.2 simplified format with dynamic technique names from enterprise-attack.json, removed redundant name/description/category fields, enhanced with additional-post-attack-questions.md coverage
metadata.parent_technique_logic: Includes conditional questions for parent techniques when no sub-techniques are selected, plus comprehensive sub-technique selection rationale questions for all 97 parent techniques
metadata.unusual_technique_coverage: Comprehensive coverage of unusual/rare techniques requiring detailed write-ups
